region: Global (serves Coronado US, Tanzania, Chile, Indonesia, etc.)

customers.usage_stats: Coronado delivered 75% improvement in recovery modeling; Copperman planning $500K spend to test target predicted by platform; 1 payment of $3K pending. First batch of 5-10 exploration companies onboarding to filesystem tool in next 2 months.

team.operation_notes: Hiring difficult—three paid engineering trials but still solo founder as of Feb 2025. Intention to hire another engineer remains.

product_updates.description: Launched new website iteration for exploration companies, including all core functionality and new file management.
product_updates.impact: Brings exploration-focused features under a unified platform.

product_updates.description: Predictions for Copperman, including deep-tuned 1.5km deposit prediction and depth-wise optimization.
product_updates.impact: Customer considering $500K spend to test predicted target.

product_updates.description: Coronado: Delivered formal proposal for annual pricing after successful recovery model (+75% improvement).
product_updates.impact: Potential annualized contract pending for 2025 with Coronado.

product_updates.description: Developed a unique data ingestion system for mining formats (Excel, CSV, PDF), reconstructing 3D data.
product_updates.impact: Standalone value recognized; unique system vs. industry alternatives.

events.description: Coronado US Engineering Director requested and received a formal annual pricing proposal for executive review.

notes: Revenue dropped to $0 MRR (from $10K in Dec) in Jan/Feb 2025. Coronado, Copperman, and Mwamba are reference customers; focus on onboarding 5–10 exploration companies on new platform. Product opportunity exists in unique data ingestion. Still only one FTE; hiring remains priority. $3K pending payment from Copperman. Prior months: Oct/Dec 2024 MRR was $10K. Recent SEED round was $1.5M+. Runway >5 years. Highly positive product feedback on modeling quality and ingestion capability.
source: Investor Update January + February 2025 + historical context
